response.overview: There are two best friends named Dhanji and Ramji who stay is Rampura and Shyampura respectively. To convert their friendship into relationship they fix married of Ramji' son Shivkumar and Dhanji's daughter Jyoti. On the day of wedding,the bride dies as she accidentally slips and falls. The maintain the tradition and glory of both the family. Dhanji convinces his younger daughter Radha to take the place of the bride. Shivkumar promises her that he will get her man of dreams to her and leaves the house in search of the same. Accidentally he falls off in a temple ,where lord Kishna appears in disguise of a young boy named Kishan and takes Shivkumar to Hospital. Shivkumar feels that Kishan is the perfect man of dream for Radha and takes him to meet Radha.
response.title: Maiydh Thari Chidkali Radha
